New England Hardware Security Day


April 7th, 2023, Egan Research Center 240, Northeastern University, Boston, MA






New England Hardware Security (NEHWS) Day brings together many students, researchers, practitioners, and industry partners in the field of hardware security to share their work and foster new ideas.

We look forward to meet you on Friday, April 7, 2023 in the Egan Research Center 240 in Boston, MA!

  • Presenting a poster? Make sure the format is 24x36 (WxH).
  • Making a presentation? Make sure to upload your slides according to the email instructions.
